description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. Why is an Angel fallen? What is his destiny? Can he turn from good and do evil?  Missions, fights, flights, cutscenes and free urban environment are only the main features of the game.
